metadata.title: CVE-2017-10672 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free in the XML-LibXML module through 2.0129 for Perl allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary code by controlling the arguments toa replaceChild call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10672` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxml-libxml-perl - 2.0123+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxml-libxml-perl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.0123+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1').
